verses.verse: לְאָדָ֥ם <WH120> in man מַֽעַרְכֵי־ <WH4633> The preparations לֵ֑ב <WH3820> of the heart וּ֝מֵיְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> [is] from the LORD מַעֲנֵ֥ה <WH4617> and the answer לָשֽׁוֹן׃ <WH3956> of the tongue כָּֽל־ <WH3605> all manner דַּרְכֵי־ <WH1870> along
אִ֭ישׁ <WH376> of a man זַ֣ךְ <WH2134> [are] clean בְּעֵינָ֑יו <WH5869> in his own eyes וְתֹכֵ֖ן <WH8505> weigheth רוּח֣וֹת <WH7307> the spirits יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3069> God
גֹּ֣ל <WH1556> Commit אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto the LORD מַעֲשֶׂ֑יךָ <WH4639> thy works וְ֝יִכֹּ֗נוּ <WH3559> shall be established מַחְשְׁבֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH4284> and thy thoughts

כֹּ֤ל <WH3605> everything פָּעַ֣ל <WH6466> hath made יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> The LORD לַֽמַּעֲנֵ֑הוּ <WH4617> all [things] for himself וְגַם־ <WH1571> Even רָ֝שָׁ֗ע <WH7563> yea even the wicked לְי֣וֹם <WH3117> for the day רָעָֽה׃ <WH7451> of evil

תּוֹעֲבַ֣ת <WH8441> [is] an abomination יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> to the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> Everyone גְּבַהּ־ <WH1362> Every one [that is] proud לֵ֑ב <WH3820> in heart יָ֥ד <WH3027> [though] hand לְ֝יָ֗ד <WH3027> [join] in hand לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יִנָּקֶֽה׃ <WH5352> he shall not be unpunished

בְּחֶ֣סֶד <WH2617> By mercy וֶ֭אֱמֶת <WH571> and truth יְכֻפַּ֣ר <WH3722> is purged עָוֹ֑ן <WH5771> iniquity וּבְיִרְאַ֥ת <WH3374> and by the fear יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD ס֣וּר <WH5493> [men] depart מֵרָֽע׃ <WH7451> from evil

בִּרְצ֣וֹת <WH7521> please יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> the LORD דַּרְכֵי־ <WH1870> ways אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> When a man's גַּם־ <WH1571> even א֝וֹיְבָ֗יו <WH341> he maketh even his enemies יַשְׁלִ֥ם <WH7999> to be at peace אִתּֽוֹ׃ <WH854> for

טוֹב־ <WH2896> Better מְ֭עַט <WH4592> [is] a little בִּצְדָקָ֑ה <WH6666> with righteousness מֵרֹ֥ב <WH7230> than great תְּ֝בוּא֗וֹת <WH8393> revenues בְּלֹ֣א <WH3808> not מִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> without right
לֵ֣ב <WH3820> heart אָ֭דָם <WH120> A man's יְחַשֵּׁ֣ב <WH2803> deviseth דַּרְכּ֑וֹ <WH1870> his way וַֽ֝יהוָ֗ה <WH3068> but the LORD יָכִ֥ין <WH3559> directeth צַעֲדֽוֹ׃ <WH6806> his steps

קֶ֤סֶם ׀ <WH7081> A divine sentence עַֽל־ <WH5921> is in שִׂפְתֵי־ <WH8193> [is] in the lips מֶ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king בְּ֝מִשְׁפָּ֗ט <WH4941> not in judgment לֹ֣א <WH3808> should not יִמְעַל־ <WH4603> transgresseth פִּֽיו׃ <WH6310> his mouth

פֶּ֤לֶס ׀ <WH6425> weight וּמֹאזְנֵ֣י <WH3976> and balance מִ֭שְׁפָּט <WH4941> A just לַֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> [are] the LORD'S מַ֝עֲשֵׂ֗הוּ <WH4639> [are] his work כָּל־ <WH3605> All אַבְנֵי־ <WH68> all the weights כִֽיס׃ <WH3599> of the bag

תּוֹעֲבַ֣ת <WH8441> [It is] an abomination מְ֭לָכִים <WH4428> to kings עֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> to commit רֶ֑שַׁע <WH7562> wickedness כִּ֥י <WH3588> on בִ֝צְדָקָ֗ה <WH6666> by righteousness יִכּ֥וֹן <WH3559> is established כִּסֵּֽא׃ <WH3678> for the throne

רְצ֣וֹן <WH7522> [are] the delight מְ֭לָכִים <WH4428> of kings שִׂפְתֵי־ <WH8193> lips צֶ֑דֶק <WH6664> Righteous וְדֹבֵ֖ר <WH1696> him that speaketh יְשָׁרִ֣ים <WH3477> right יֶאֱהָֽב׃ <WH157> and they love

חֲמַת־ <WH2534> The wrath מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> of a king מַלְאֲכֵי־ <WH4397> [is as] messengers מָ֑וֶת <WH4194> of death וְאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> man חָכָ֣ם <WH2450> but a wise יְכַפְּרֶֽנָּה׃ <WH3722> will pacify בְּאוֹר־ <WH216> light פְּנֵי־ <WH6440> accept
מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king's חַיִּ֑ים <WH2416> [is] life וּ֝רְצוֹנ֗וֹ <WH7522> and his favour כְּעָ֣ב <WH5645> [is] as a cloud מַלְקֽוֹשׁ׃ <WH4456> of the latter rain

קְֽנֹה־ <WH7069> [is it] to get חָכְמָ֗ה <WH2451> wisdom מַה־ <WH4100> How טּ֥וֹב <WH2896> How much better מֵחָר֑וּץ <WH2742> than gold וּקְנ֥וֹת <WH7069> and to get בִּ֝ינָ֗ה <WH998> understanding נִבְחָ֥ר <WH977> rather to be chosen מִכָּֽסֶף׃ <WH3701> than silver

מְסִלַּ֣ת <WH4546> The highway יְ֭שָׁרִים <WH3477> of the upright ס֣וּר <WH5493> [is] to depart מֵרָ֑ע <WH7451> from evil שֹׁמֵ֥ר <WH8104> preserveth נַ֝פְשׁ֗וֹ <WH5315> his soul נֹצֵ֥ר <WH5341> he that keepeth דַּרְכּֽוֹ׃ <WH1870> his way
לִפְנֵי־ <WH6440> [goeth] before שֶׁ֥בֶר <WH7667> destruction גָּא֑וֹן <WH1347> Pride וְלִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before כִ֝שָּׁל֗וֹן <WH3783> a fall גֹּ֣בַהּ <WH1363> and an haughty רֽוּחַ׃ <WH7307> spirit

ט֣וֹב <WH2896> Better שְׁפַל־ <WH8217> [it is to be] of an humble ר֭וּחַ <WH7307> spirit אֶת־ <WH854> for [עֲנִיִּים כ] (עֲנָוִ֑ים <WH6041> afflicted ק) מֵֽחַלֵּ֥ק <WH2505> than to divide שָׁ֝לָ֗ל <WH7998> the spoil אֶת־ <WH854> with גֵּאִֽים׃ <WH1343> with the proud

מַשְׂכִּ֣יל <WH7919> wisely עַל־ <WH5921> unto דָּ֭בָר <WH1697> He that handleth a matter יִמְצָא־ <WH4672> shall find ט֑וֹב <WH2896> good וּבוֹטֵ֖חַ <WH982> and whoso trusteth בַּיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> in the LORD אַשְׁרָֽיו׃ <WH835> happy

לַחֲכַם־ <WH2450> The wise לֵ֭ב <WH3820> in heart יִקָּרֵ֣א <WH7121> shall be called נָב֑וֹן <WH995> prudent וּמֶ֥תֶק <WH4986> and the sweetness שְׂ֝פָתַ֗יִם <WH8193> of the lips יֹסִ֥יף <WH3254> increaseth לֶֽקַח׃ <WH3948> learning

מְק֣וֹר <WH4726> [is] a wellspring חַ֭יִּים <WH2416> of life שֵׂ֣כֶל <WH7922> Understanding בְּעָלָ֑יו <WH1167> unto him that hath וּמוּסַ֖ר <WH4148> it but the instruction אֱוִלִ֣ים <WH191> of fools אִוֶּֽלֶת׃ <WH200> [is] folly

לֵ֣ב <WH3820> The heart חָ֭כָם <WH2450> of the wise יַשְׂכִּ֣יל <WH7919> teacheth פִּ֑יהוּ <WH6310> his mouth וְעַל־ <WH5921> unto שְׂ֝פָתָ֗יו <WH8193> to his lips יֹסִ֥יף <WH3254> and addeth לֶֽקַח׃ <WH3948> learning

צוּף־ <WH6688> honeycomb דְּ֭בַשׁ <WH1706> honey אִמְרֵי־ <WH561> words נֹ֑עַם <WH5278> Pleasant מָת֥וֹק <WH4966> sweet לַ֝נֶּפֶשׁ <WH5315> to the soul וּמַרְפֵּ֥א <WH4832> and health לָעָֽצֶם׃ <WH6106> to the bones

יֵ֤שׁ <WH3426> There is דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> a way יָ֭שָׁר <WH3477> that seemeth right לִפְנֵי־ <WH6440> unto אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> a man וְ֝אַחֲרִיתָ֗הּ <WH319> but the end דַּרְכֵי־ <WH1870> thereof [are] the ways מָֽוֶת׃ <WH4194> of death
נֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> He עָ֭מֵל <WH6001> that laboureth עָ֣מְלָה <WH5998> laboureth לּ֑וֹ כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אָכַ֖ף <WH404> craveth עָלָ֣יו <WH5921> For פִּֽיהוּ׃ <WH6310> for himself for his mouth

אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man בְּ֭לִיַּעַל <WH1100> An ungodly כֹּרֶ֣ה <WH3738> diggeth up רָעָ֑ה <WH7451> evil וְעַל־ <WH5921> While [שְׂפָתָיו כ] (פָתֹ֗ו <WH8193> band ק) כְּאֵ֣שׁ <WH784> fire צָרָֽבֶת׃ <WH6867> [there is] as a burning

אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man תַּ֭הְפֻּכוֹת <WH8419> A froward יְשַׁלַּ֣ח <WH7971> soweth מָד֑וֹן <WH4066> strife וְ֝נִרְגָּ֗ן <WH5372> and a whisperer מַפְרִ֥יד <WH6504> separateth אַלּֽוּף׃ <WH441> chief friends

אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man חָ֭מָס <WH2555> A violent יְפַתֶּ֣ה <WH6601> enticeth רֵעֵ֑הוּ <WH7453> his neighbour וְ֝הוֹלִיכ֗וֹ <WH1980> and leads בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> him into the way לֹא־ <WH3808> is not טֽוֹב׃ <WH2896> [that is] not good

עֹצֶ֣ה <WH6095> He shutteth עֵ֭ינָיו <WH5869> his eyes לַחְשֹׁ֣ב <WH2803> to devise תַּהְפֻּכ֑וֹת <WH8419> froward things קֹרֵ֥ץ <WH7169> moving שְׂ֝פָתָ֗יו <WH8193> his lips כִּלָּ֥ה <WH3615> to pass רָעָֽה׃ <WH7451> evil
עֲטֶ֣רֶת <WH5850> [is] a crown תִּפְאֶ֣רֶת <WH8597> of glory שֵׂיבָ֑ה <WH7872> The hoary head בְּדֶ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> in the way צְ֝דָקָ֗ה <WH6666> of righteousness תִּמָּצֵֽא׃ <WH4672> [if] it be found

ט֤וֹב <WH2896> [is] better אֶ֣רֶךְ <WH750> [He that is] slow אַ֭פַּיִם <WH639> to anger מִגִּבּ֑וֹר <WH1368> than the mighty וּמֹשֵׁ֥ל <WH4910> and he that ruleth בְּ֝רוּח֗וֹ <WH7307> his spirit מִלֹּכֵ֥ד <WH3920> than he that taketh עִֽיר׃ <WH5892> a city

בַּ֭חֵיק <WH2436> into the lap יוּטַ֣ל <WH2904> is cast אֶת־ <WH853> הַגּוֹרָ֑ל <WH1486> The lot וּ֝מֵיְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> thereof [is] of the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> every מִשְׁפָּטֽוֹ׃ <WH4941> but the whole disposing
